diseases.name: Potato_Early_Blight
diseases.symptoms: Brown spots with concentric rings on leaves.
diseases.cause: Fungal infection caused by Alternaria solani.
diseases.organic_treatment: Spray Neem oil or Baking soda solution.
diseases.chemical_treatment: Apply fungicides containing Mancozeb or Chlorothalonil.

diseases.name: Potato_Late_Blight
diseases.symptoms: Dark brown blotches with white fungal growth.

diseases.name: Rice_Brown_Spot
diseases.symptoms: Round to oval dark-brown lesions with yellow halos.
diseases.organic_treatment: Hot water treatment of seeds (53-54Â°C) for 10-12 minutes.
diseases.chemical_treatment: Seed treatment with Carbendazim or Mancozeb.

diseases.name: Rice_Leaf_Blast
diseases.symptoms: Spindle-shaped spots with gray centers and brown margins.

risk_factors.alert_message: High Humidity detected! Risk of Blast is severe.

diseases.name: Wheat_Stripe_Rust
diseases.symptoms: Yellow streaks (pustules) forming stripes on leaves.
diseases.organic_treatment: Remove infected plants; Use resistant varieties.

diseases.name: Wheat_Septoria
diseases.symptoms: Yellow flecks turning into irregular brown blotches.
diseases.organic_treatment: Crop rotation and proper residue management.

diseases.name: Tomato_Bacterial_Spot
diseases.symptoms: Small, water-soaked spots on leaves that turn brown.
diseases.organic_treatment: Copper sprays and avoid overhead watering.

diseases.name: Tomato_Early_Blight
diseases.symptoms: Dark, concentric rings (bullseye) on lower leaves.
diseases.organic_treatment: Remove lower leaves, mulch soil, use neem oil.

diseases.name: Tomato_Late_Blight
diseases.symptoms: Greasy, gray-green spots on leaves; white mold in wet weather.

diseases.name: Tomato_Leaf_Mold
diseases.symptoms: Pale yellow spots on upper leaf surface; gray mold underneath.

diseases.name: Tomato_Healthy
diseases.symptoms: Green, vibrant leaves with no spots.
